texto: plans or the quality management system itself. © ISO 2005 – All rights reserved 13 ISO 10005:2005(E) Annex A (informative) ON-Download - Service, 11.11.2005, 856867-2, Quality Austria Trainings-, Zertifizierungs- und Begutachtungs GmbH, Gonzagagasse 1/24, A-1010 Wien Simplified examples of formats for the presentation of quality plans A.1 General This annex provides examples of some of the formats in which quality plans may be presented. The examples shown should not be taken as being complete as regards the quality plan content defined in Clause 5. Actual quality plans may be more complex.
